title: Collateral Umbrella Distribution Status File Schema
description: Collateral Umbrella Distribution Status File Schema

transactionIdentification.description: Unique identifier for financial transactions with alphanumeric pattern validation

participantIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier provided by A5X during the participant registration

participantIdentificationCategory.$comment: Only categories (Intermediário Full), (Participante de Liquidação), and (Intermediário Light) are allowed to include an account. Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode.

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral ID given by the requestor participant.

operationValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

operationValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
operationValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralValueAmount.description: Monetary amount with up to 2 decimal places

collateralValueCurrency.description: Currency code in which the amount is denominated
collateralValueCurrency.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCurrencyCode

collateralStatusCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

collateralStatusErrorIdentificationCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralStatusErrorIdentificationCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode

collateralUmbrellaStatusCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralUmbrellaStatusCode.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

collateralUmbrellaStatusErrorIdentificat.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
collateralUmbrellaStatusErrorIdentificat.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalErrorCollateralCode, ExternalErrorRegistrationCode, ExternalAllocationErrorCode
